message.body: Did you get my voicemail?
Why are you ignoring me?
Tim, please, you're scaring me
Not really ignoring, just been busy. Also pretty hurt. I'll call sometime soon.
What are you hurt about?
I know you're awake - Tim, I'm trying to be a friend
You wouldn't let me get away with this
(01/03) So many things Martha. Scott. That you're dating someone so soon after dumping me. It makes me feel sick. Little things like you deleting the only photo
(02/03) of you and I and blocking me on gchat. And you HAVE gotten away with this since day one! This is exactly how you've treated me since you dumped me. I'm
(03/03) not trying to be didactic or prove a point, just observing. I want to believe you so badly Mattie, but you don't feel like a friend.
Great text convo
Oof

Don't I have the ability to date someone else and still be a friend? And I did do those things but not to hurt you. It hurt me to see a picture of you and I and I went invisible bc I was terribly busy! But that doesn't negate the fact that I'm reaching out now and saying the things I said last time.
(01/02) Im sure there's an explanation for everything. It just hurts like fucking hell. And until now you haven't been a friend. You're going to need to say th
(02/02) ose things many times before they mean anything.
Ok, well I'll do what I can but you have to forgive me for them for this friendship to work. One question: how did you know I was dating Scott?
Ok that should be easy. Because I know how you operate. You're already dating him?
"because i know how you operate." Forget it, Tim.

I'm deeply offended - though I totally understand your feelings and apologize that this knowledge makes you uncomfortable though I assure you I didn't do anything to demean you. In the end I can't justify your means for expressing yourself or those feelings. It only proves the fact that we shouldn't be communicating then. So please stop.
(01/02) You dump me and start dating someone you've been friends with for a while. Before it was "not a possibility " as you told me, but once it was, or incent
(02/02) ive there was the slightest chance there would be, you dumped me. That's how it seems
What? You asked me!

I broke up with you because of fundamental flaws in the relationship. Period. I did ask but now I'm asking for space bc I already feel deep shame for ending things honestly without you saying that I was dishonest.
(01/02) That's not fair at all. I'm sorry if I offended you, I'm not attacking your character Martha. And not suggesting you were dishonest. Lack of communicati
(02/02) on is what leads me to conjecture. When you communicate with me I have no reason for those thoughts
I communicated with you this week. I had the right to take time at the beginning. You can feel hurt but you can't say hurtful things to me. Either way, I want some space
(01/05) Fuck Martha. I'm sorry that came off that way. Really. Can you please, for once, not ask for space. These whole fucking two months have been at your con
(02/05) venience. I don't expect you to talk any more than you have, but please don't ask for more space. It makes things worse. It makes me think that you don'
(03/05) t actually want to TRY at a friendship because space is easier. Please stop being defensive and make yourself vulnerable in some way and I will do the s
(04/05) ame. Just be fucking honest with me because you care about me. I'm sick and tired and need you to be a friend. I know how you operate, and by that I mea
(05/05) n I know you know how to do things right. Even if it's hard.
That isn't what you meant. I'm not going to fight with you. I'll be open.
(01/02) I don't know what I meant before but that is what i mean now. Just do what's right Mattie. Not what's right for me or right for you, just what's right.
(02/02) And please no more serious conversations via text message or at 6 am. Or on Friday the 13 th. That's not right.
